children.text: The Pancheros Burritos with Benefits rewards program is valid only at particpating United States locations. To earn points in the Pancheros rewards program, scan the barcode on your receipt with the installed Pancheros app or scan the QR code on the Earn Points screen of the app. You will receive (1) one point for every dollar you spend (tax excluded). When you reach 100 points, your points will be converted into a reward for a free menu item. You can choose between any of the (5) five main menu items: Burrito, Burrito Bowl, Quesadilla, Salad, Tacos. Donec facilisis tortor ut augue lacinia, at viverra est semper. Sed sapien metus, scelerisque nec pharetra id, tempor a tortor. Pellentesque non dignissim neque. Ut porta viverra est, ut dignissim elit elementum ut. Nunc vel rhoncus nibh, ut tincidunt turpis. Integer ac enim pellentesque, adipiscing metus id, pharetra odio. Donec bibendum nunc sit amet tortor scelerisque luctus et sit amet mauris.
